name: Adobe Lightroom Classic Plug-in
summary: An LRPLUGIN file is a plug-in used by Adobe Lightroom Classic, the desktop-only version of Adobe Lightroom . It contains data used to add a new feature to Lightroom Classic. For example, an LRPLUGIN file may contain a plug-in that allows you to automatically publish photos to Facebook, Flickr, or another online service.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: LRPLUGIN file open in Adobe Lightroom Classic Plug-in Manager
images.alt: LRPLUGIN file open in Adobe Lightroom Classic Plug-in Manager
